title: 12-Month Final Assessment
description: Final comprehensive survey one year after completing the AI training program - measuring long-term employment retention and program ROI.

questions.question: Are you currently employed?
options: No, by choice (sabbatical, further education, etc.)

questions.question: What is your current job title?
questions.placeholder: e.g., AI Data Analyst, Machine Learning Engineer, etc.

questions.question: What company or type of company do you work for?
questions.placeholder: Company name or type (e.g., Tech startup, Healthcare company)

questions.question: How many different AI-related jobs have you had since completing the program?
How satisfied are you with your current role?
Compared to before the program, how has your career trajectory changed?
options: Dramatically improved (better job, better pay, better prospects)

questions.question: What is your current annual salary or hourly rate?
Have you received any promotions or role changes since you started in AI?
options: No, still in same role at same level

questions.question: Are you using skills from the program in your day-to-day work?
Since completing the program, have you pursued additional training or certifications?
options: No, but I'm thinking about it

questions.question: If you selected 'Other' for additional training, please specify:
Do you feel your AI knowledge is keeping up with industry demands?
How would you rate the program's overall impact on your career?
What specific part of the program had the most lasting impact?
If you selected 'Other', please specify what had the most lasting impact:
questions.placeholder: Describe what had the most impact...

questions.question: If you could change one thing about the program, what would it be?
What advice would you give to someone starting the program today?
questions.placeholder: Share your wisdom with future students...

questions.question: Have you recommended this program to others?
options: No, but I would if asked

questions.question: Would you be willing to be a guest speaker or mentor for future cohorts?
options: No, but I appreciate being asked

questions.question: How would you like to stay connected with the program? (Select all that apply)
Is there anything else you'd like the program to know?
questions.placeholder: Share any additional thoughts, feedback, or comments...
